definition: a long shallow trench in the ground (especially one made by a plow), hollow out in the form of a furrow or groove
details:
noun
- a long shallow trench in the ground (especially one made by a plow)
- a slight depression in the smoothness of a surface
= synonyms: line
verb
- hollow out in the form of a furrow or groove
= example: hollow out in the form of a furrow or groove
= synonyms: rut
- cut a furrow into a columns
= synonyms: chase
- make wrinkled or creased
= example: make wrinkled or creased
= synonyms: crease, wrinkle
